body: This is literally represent of what manga and anime from 2010s be like. It is not even close to 2000s, not to mention 90s. Go to the oldest doujin on this website and u'll taste real "old" style lol
Leopard one of the OGs that got me into hentai and ruined me.Bless you
damn now this is a fucking throwback to the past

Bruh what? Early 2000's? 90's? How? Even with the slight differences in this doujin, it's not even close, not even to mid-2000's styles nor imitating anything. The original basis of this doujin is from an anime in 2014 with its LN from 2010 which is still relatively far from "early 2000's". I've already read a few older doujins and no, not even close to that era's style. Just saying.
Translated Chaika in this day and age?
@nhcasual it was released in 2014, not early 2000
@SCP Object 096 That's because it IS an old doujin as you suspect, early 2000 I believe. So if it looks like it has old artstyle, its cause it literally is. Its damn hot though regardless.
Pretty good, but the art style is too classic for my tastes. This looks like it was made in the late '90s lol. Still going to favorite tho.
